dct_description_sm: Bar scale on map given in "The scale of miles;" 10 miles [= 2,9 cm].
Decorative border, coats of arms, compass rose, rhumb lines, ship, sea monsters.
16 vignettes: Beaumaris; Carnarvan; Harlieg; Cardigan; Penbrok; Carmarthen; Denbigh; Flint; Montgomery; Radnor; Brecknock; Cardife; Bangor; St Assaph; St Davids; Landafe.
From Speed's Theatre of the Empire of Great Britain, 1676.
dct_publisher_sm: Are to be Sold by Richard Chiswell in St. Pauls Churchyard & by Tho. Basset in Fleetstreet
